scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred features, potentially leading to targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Assess the robustness of the customer churn prediction model against adversarial attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: The model predicts customer churn probability based on features such as age, income, transaction history, and investment portfolio details.  The data is heavily anonymized but still contains sensitive information inferable through model inversion.
